title: What is the maximum power that J1772 can deliver? - Quora

response.answer_text: The J-1772 has been designed to handle up to 19.2 kW. This of course depends on the ability of the car to take that level of charging and the 240 volts circuit to provide that high of a rate. Most are about 6 kW. Per NEC 625 Up to 19.2
